snippet: At the same time, the administration rejected the pleas of other states to partially expand Medicaid, causing some Republicans to express disappointment.
abstract: Obama administration gives conditional approval to health insurance marketplaces being set up by Colorado, Connecticut, Maryland, Massachusetts, Oregon and Washington, all led by Democratic governors eager to carry out Obama's health care overhaul.
lead_paragraph: At the same time, the administration rejected the pleas of other states to partially expand Medicaid, causing some Republicans to express disappointment.

headline.seo: Obama Approves Health Insurance Marketplaces in 6 States
headline.main: Obama Approves Health Insurance Marketplaces in 6 States
headline.print_headline: Administration Gives Early Approval to Health Insurance Marketplaces in 6 States

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
